question: What is the average velocity of aircraft flying international routes compared to domestic routes?
query:
SELECT CASE WHEN dep.iso_country = arr.iso_country THEN 'Domestic' ELSE 'International' END AS route_type,
       AVG(ac.velocity) AS average_velocity
FROM postgres_air.flight f
JOIN postgres_air.aircraft ac ON f.aircraft_code = ac.code
JOIN postgres_air.airport dep ON f.departure_airport = dep.airport_code
JOIN postgres_air.airport arr ON f.arrival_airport = arr.airport_code
GROUP BY CASE WHEN dep.iso_country = arr.iso_country THEN 'Domestic' ELSE 'International' END;
